name: So Far Together
description:
You're lost in an abandoned hospital that doesn't seem to abide by any laws of reality.. but wait is that your daughter screaming?

So Far Together is a short horror game about finding your daughter in a maze of changing halls and rooms. Unravel the mystery of what the monster that is roaming the facility is, and more importantly how your daughter got there in the first place.

Headphones Recommended (basically required)!

This game was made for my friends in my Discord to enjoy on Halloween, but it turned out so well that I thought I'd post it on here too! Please feel free to share your theories about Sarah!
